i18n.title: Mutable Variable Bindings in Rust
i18n.description: In this lab, you will learn about mutability in Rust and how variable bindings can be made mutable using the mut modifier. The lab includes an example of declaring immutable and mutable bindings, demonstrating how a mutable binding can be modified, and highlighting the error when trying to assign a new value to an immutable variable.

meta.title: Rust Mutability | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn about mutability in Rust and how to use the mut modifier to make variable bindings mutable. Explore immutable and mutable bindings, and understand the errors when trying to assign a new value to an immutable variable.
meta.keywords: Rust, Mutability, Programming, Tutorials, Variable Bindings

verify.name: This step has no verification at the moment

i18n.title: Rust 中的可变变量绑定
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将了解 Rust 中的可变性，以及如何使用 mut 修饰符使变量绑定变为可变。本实验包括声明不可变和可变绑定的示例，展示如何修改可变绑定，并强调尝试为不可变变量分配新值时的错误。

meta.title: Rust 可变性 | 编程教程
meta.description: 了解 Rust 中的可变性以及如何使用 mut 修饰符使变量绑定可变。探索不可变和可变绑定，并理解尝试为不可变变量分配新值时的错误。
meta.keywords: Rust, 可变性, 编程, 教程, 变量绑定
